lib
Class FlipReader

java.lang.Object
  lib.FlipReader

public class FlipReader
extends java.lang.Object

Flipreader is an input stream reader that is able to flip between text and binary. The main interface is like StringTokenizer, but you can switch to binary readBytes. The convention for flipping is to call read() until a | is read, which marks the boundary of binary data.

Author:
Ddyer
